channel.title: CVE Feed for Ivanti -- EPM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ivanti -- EPM

item.title: CVE-2024-32846|2024-09-12T03:55:15.772Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL injection in Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote authenticated attacker with admin privileges to achieve remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-32843|2024-09-12T03:55:13.114Z -- ivanti -- epm

item.title: CVE-2024-29847|2024-09-12T03:55:22.457Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: Deserialization of untrusted data in the agent portal of Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to achieve remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-37381|2024-08-02T03:50:55.937Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2024 flat allows an authenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-22058|2024-08-01T22:35:34.747Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: A buffer overflow allows a low privilege user on the local machine that has the EPM Agent installed to execute arbitrary code with elevated permissions in Ivanti EPM 2021.1 and older.

item.title: CVE-2024-37381|2024-07-29T13:47:00.661Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2024 flat allows an authenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2022 SU5 and prior allows an unauthenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.
